title: Pokémon GO Fest 2022 back as in-person event, check dates and cities
content:
Pokémon GO Fest 2022 is returning as a two-day global event. This time, there will also be in-person events in the US, Germany, and Japan during the summer. Here’s everything we know so far about GO Fest activities this year.

more…
